reference.title: Comparison functions
reference.shortdesc: Comparison functions determines the greatest or least value from a set of values. The following table lists the comparison functions.

strow.stentry: Evaluates the expressions and finds the greatest non-NULL, non-MISSING value if the values are of the same type. Otherwise, NULL.
Evaluates the expressions and finds the least non-NULL, non-MISSING VALUE value if the values are of the same type. Otherwise, NULL.
